TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Nepal, title = Nepal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepal} }

S.FORM: = Nepal = Gaga kska Yacow ka Nepal, 28 00 N, 84 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 147,181 sq km(hangan na o Tg94) (knlbanga dxgal o 143,351 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 3,830 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 29,033,914 hiyi. Gaga Kathmandu ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 28 idas 5 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Nepal ga wada sugan 28.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 25.40% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 45.80% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Bidhya Devi Bhandari, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 10 jiyax 29pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Nepal = Nepal = Nepal pa wa mniq dxral nniqan tuhunac tudu dwiyaq Himalaya na 1 qnlhangan kcka dxral, tudaya u mslutuc Cyokoku, tu3 dqras dxral daw msdalih India, tuhuy qnlhangan Bengal wana mkiyax bay 27 km ksanan elu. Knlbangan dxral Nepal u 14.7181 knbkiyan km, tu93 bnkuwan knkana qnlangan, 2972 knhbrawan hiyi sediq u tu48 bnkuwan knkana qnlangan kiya. Alaw wa mniq dxral tubaraw ka nniqan dha, knbaraw bay kcka mk10 dwiyaq qnlangan u wa mniq kcka dxral mi mtayus Nepal ka 8 knbaraw dwiyaq, kiya ka knbaraw balay Dudux Dwiyaq Sngmu, so kiya u yahan balay sdhmawan rmiwaw sediq smkuxul mkala ddwiyaq uri. Niqan knrudah bay hniti jaysang bungka qnlangan ka Nepal, pusu pnyahan snhiyan Bu kyo ka Buda Sakamuni u kiya ka mntuting Nepal. Pusu balay snlhayan snhiyan qnlhangan ka India kyo, duma ini khbaraw ka smluhay Cangcwan Bu kyo mi Islam kyo. Nepal pa niqan bay hnhangan qnlangan quri knrmnan bay mi mbiyax bay mtdiyal ka sediq Kuruk. 18 th kcka cida wada phiyu Nepal Wangkwo, kiya u mnknrmux Sicang uri, bukuy daw wada muCingcaw qnlhangan Hwansu. Mniq 19 th pnrdingan cida Ingkoku mi Nepal ka mccbu daw, Nepal u wada muway dxral mnIngkoku India kiya mi mnsupu ppwaluk dhiya. Nepal u ida balay India kyo Pnwaya Bukung qnlhangan. Kngkawas 2006 cida, kwohuy u wada hmtur biyax bukung qnlhangan Cyanantra, kngkawas 2008 idas 5 diyax 28, Nepal pnwaya keyngpo kaygi cida u wada mndungus bay muda snburah smmalu keyngpo ang, plixan ka pnwaya bukung mi knpriyux hangan qnlhangan Nepal Ryeynpang Mincu Konghkwo. Ri-s Brah 7 th han. Nepal u knrudah bay qnlhangan Asia uri. Cbiyaw balay han pa kcka dxral Nepal u ou bay ini pntna qnlhangan han, mniq brah 6 th han, mniq brah 6 th han, sediq Nepal u tna mniq quri msdalih yayung Katmantu tnpusu mniq. 12 th brah han u, India mnswayi Kanak bukung qnlhangan Kusyadwaci miyah Kepal mi wada phyuwan bukung Nepal, bukuy daw pnhiyu Kpar, Asir, Kirati, Ricawi…wangcaw. Ya bay mniq brah kongweyn kngkawas 563, Sakamuni u mntuting kcka dxral Nepal saya na qnlhangan Ranpini knrudah Kapirowi, tmnsa quri snlhayan Sakamuni u kiya ka Bu kyo. Skari Cang Myeyn joku sediq Niwar ka wada dha ngalan Katmantu dxral ayu na Sediq Tnpusu, binaw dhiya u uxay to sediq kluwan tunarac, niqan knou ka sediq Yarian. 17 th ka 'King Jidayi' sediq Niwar, qnlhangan Mala wangcaw ka Nepal u kiya ka Sicang mi tudaya India dxral mbrnux iyax dha pusu bay mawyi sunyo. Cida, Katmantu, Patan mi Paktapur u txtaxa nanaq muda ddaun dha ini psupu, turu alang mkbrnux u msnhur balay. Kuruk wangkwo 17 th kcka cida mtutuy ka sediq Kuruk, mniq tuiwil yayung Kandaki mkngahu phiyu 1 tiping wangkwo ( brah hniwan Saa wangcaw), kngkawas 1768, Puritwi Narayang Saa ka wada pskingal nniqan dxral Nepal, mnhdu Katmantu dxral ayu tu3 alang mkbrnux mpsanak mqriqu ddaun. Kari Niwar- sediq mcayis kluwan ka sediq Niwar u skari kari Cang Myeyn, kndadax 12 th prading daw kiya ka ddiyun kari seyhu mi kari quri ptpatas wenswey, dhuq saya wada spririh kari Nepal-Tuiwil nniqan sediq India ccida sediq Kas na kari In O yusi ka rmirih da. Mbiyax bay qnlhangan na Kuruk u mniq kngkawas 1788 mi kngkawas 1791 mn2 kmrmux Sicang, hiti balay daw wada htran Cingcaw, rikisi u splawa 'Mccbu Kuruk'. Babaw mnhdu mccbu Kuruk daw mtuhuy Cingting mddahur, wada mnqnlhangan Cingcaw, mquri hongti Cingcaw cngcn cinkong. Kiya mi mnIngkoku Tunarac India Kojyo mniq qmlahang India daw, kndudul mquri tudaya knrmuxm knttu knrmux Cemongsyong mi Bhutan dtiping qnlhangan. So kiya, Kuruk mi Cingcaw pa ida pwaluk knmalu conghwan pnluban dha, kiya ka shtur knrmxan Ingkoku. Kndadax Cingcaw kcka daw mowic ka qnlhangan, mrrudu ka kcka qnlhangan mi niqan ka miyah knrmux nganguc Cingcaw, uka biyax dha qndahang payis nganguc. Snpeyyah babaw pnhyuwan ka Cyoka minkoku daw, Weynsukay u mniyux lmawa Nepal (Kiya ka Kuruk) tumal pnspuwan 5 joku msupu, binaw cida daw wada qlhangan Ingkoku ka Nepal da. Wada krtan muway Ingkoku ka dxral tuhunac Nepal mi Rana cngpyeyn . Kngkawas 1791, Ingkoku mi Nepal u psdhu pbatas kingal quri umlik ka 'Patas Pnsdhuwan Mpbbari '. Kngkawas 1814, Kepal mi mnIngkoku India ka mccbu, ini baka ka Nepal. Kawas 1 daw wada pkixan Ingkoku psdhu matas 'Patas Pnsdhuwan Saykri', wada kyapan subway mnIngkoku Tunarac India Kojyo ka knbeyhing bay dxral tuhunac Nepal, quri so neycng mi waymaw u sqlahang Ingkoku kana. Kngkawas 1846, mndalih Ingkoku ka heytay Kuruk Cyangko Pahatur Rana ka dmudul cngpyeyn, wada mangal qpahun quri qmlahang heytay Nepal. Snpeyyah hiya daw, wada uka mndungus bay biyax niya ka bukung qnlhangan da, tnslutuc Rana ka lmutuc qpahun sosyang. 20 th kcka bukuy cida mi mccbu ka kcka qnlhangan dha nanaq. Babaw mnhdu Tumn2 mccbu knbeyhing qnlangan daw, Ingkoku mniq Nepal u pskuraw mangal tukubeycu biyax pa, alaw ini palix knciyuk ka Nepal kiya ka wada mphing uri ka tukubeycu biyax sediq Ingkoku. Kngkawas 1951, Nepal Tahuy Tang mnsupu biyax bukung qnlhangan, pkiyax sosyang Rana malix biyax niya, mnhdu tnslutuc Rana 105 kngkawas qmnlhangan kajoku dha. Nepal bukung qnlhangan Tiribuhan pkla rinji keyngpo, muda dmuwi pnwaya bukung risyeyncu. Kngkawas 1960 idas 12 Mahengtra bukung qnlhangan ka dmuwi biyax, kngkawas 1961 idas 1 pkla kari hmtur knkana ddaun cngtang. Kngkawas 1962 idas 4 muda pnwaya ka keyngpo u Nepal ka India kyo bukung qnlhangan. Kngkawas 1989 dhuq kngkawas 1990, pspuruq knbeyhing bay 'Jnmin Undo' ka Nepal, ngalan bukung qnlhangan ka Pilantra u pkixan mniq kngkawas 1990 idas 11 diyax 9 pkla burah keyngpo, mnhdu kngkawas 1961 beytaq cida ka uka tangpay pingyihuy ticu, mniq lxayan ptmayan ou tang gikaycu. Kngkawas 1994 idas 11 diyax 15, Nepal Kyosanto (Ryeynhe Maryey) mniq seyngkyo cida u wada mbiyax, binaw mangal biyax qmpah 1 kngkawas daw wada pkixan malax da. Kngkawas 1996 idas 2 diyax 13, Nepal kyosanto (Maw Cuyi) pkla dmudul 'Jnmin Mccbu'. Kngkawas 2001 idas 6 diyax 1 kman cida, Katmantu Narayangsiti wangkong wada snturung sntali bay puniq jikeyng, wangcu Tipantra alaw quri umau qridin niya mi wada phuqil bukung qnlhangan Pilantra mi qridin bukung Ayswariya mi laqi tiping bukung Nirayang, kongcu Serudi…….10 sngari tnsapah bukung. Tipantra hiya nanaq u wada jisacu mi mangal beyhing bay luqah, bukuy daw wada ini kmalu mi mhuqil uri da. Swayi bukung qnlhangan Pilantra ka Cyanantra u idas 4 cida mniq Hanumantoka kong (Smudal wangkong) psdhu phyuwan bukung qnlhangan, lmutuc mbukung. Binaw, hbaraw bay sediq snhiyi niyi u nkeykaku Cyanantra mi smriqan niya muway tnsapah bukung ka qnnaqah nuda niyi, so kiya qnlhangan Cyanantra ka dxral Nepal pa, hnhnang tnslutuc bukung u ini pntna so Pilantra jidayi cida da. Kndadax hiya cida, Nepal Kyosanto (Maw Cuyi) na biyax ucwang u kndudul dkuhun duma sediq. Dhuq kngkawas 2006, Nepal pa wana sotu Katmantu nanaq, knou bay dxral nniqan pawada qlhangan Nepal Kyosanto kana da; kngkawas 2004 putting hiti, Nepal Kyosanto prading muda qnburang sotu. Kngkawas 2005 idas 2 diyax 1, bukung qnlhangan Cyanantra ptalax kana seyhu, pkla kari hiti 3 kngkawas daw hiya nanaq ka muda dmudul burah bucyo yingkay. Kngkawas 2006 idas 1 diyax 14, ucwang hucu ka muda mcbu Katmantu nniqan dweriq 2 keyngsateyng keysacu, phuqil 10 sngari keysacu. So kusun, Nepal neycngbu pkla kongkaw, mniq Katmantu muda pnwaya qmlahang kman,mniq idas1 diyax 19 cida u dmudul kwoing tyeynsyun kojyo pstuq Katmantu mquri nganguc ryeynraku, kiya ka hmtur idas 1 diyax 20 muda knbeyhing bay yosing mu knciyuk. Idas 4 diyax 21, spuda 7 tang ryeynmong dmudul knciyuk bikung qnlhangan mi hmtur qmpah 2 iyax diyax sngayan daw, spuda tnpkixan Amirika mi India, qnlhangan Cyanatra u wada smruwa malix biyax, smruwa subway niya sediq qnlhangan ka biyax qmlahang. Spuda treybi muda rmngaw kari ka hiya, pkla kari ptalix kana neyke, subway niya sediq qnlhangan ka biyax singcng, kiya u mpseyngkyo uri, dmudu kari hantaypay u smkaul mpsosyang niya. Idas 4 diyax 30, Koyirala musa wangkong, smruwa spuda kukung qnlhangan Cyanantra psdhuwan sosyang Nepal. Mnhdu ka mccbu kcka qnlhangan dha nanaq mi plixan ka pnwaya Bukung. Kngkawas 2006 idas 5 diyax 18, Kepal gikay u kasi mntxan muda, palax bukung qnlhangan Cyanatra knkana biyax na dmuwi heytay uri, kiya daw ini dduli tnslutuc bukung ka Nepal hiti da. Nasi pnklanan iyax cida niqan manu ka srngaw ppdungus, bukung Nepal u musa so pkla ririh weynso nanaq da. Idas 6 diyax 11, Nepal gikay u wada muda palax bukung qnlhangan 'Pquri gikay wada muda ka giang' na biyax ini sruwa, kiya ka gikay giying mniq pbatas hwaang mkhoricu brah cida, kasi ka spuda snrwanan bukung qnlhangan han. Seyhu mi Mawpay prading pprngaw kiya ka mpskingal kari ddaun qnlhangan hiti. Idas 11 diyax 7, Kyosanto Nepal mi seyhu u wada psdhu kari, malax ucwang mtdiyal, tumal seyhu. Kngkawas 2007 idas 9 diyax 18, Kyosanto Nepal pkla kari mlatac rinji seyhu. Idas 12 diyax 23, dmudul kari pwaya cyuncu risyeyn ou tang mi dmudul kari balay bay malax pwaya cyuncu, muda pwaya kongh na Kyosanto Nepal wada psdhu kari, malax pwaya cyuncu, brinah gikay Dungan ka Kyosanto Nepal . Kngkawas 2008 idas 4 diyax 10 muda knbeyhing seyngkyo, wada mbiyax mangal hmrinas 30% hyo ka Kyosanto Nepal , wada mtu1 knbeyhing tang mniq Nepal phiyu keyngpo kaygi. Kngkawas 2008 idas 5 diyax 28, phiyu keyngpo Nepal kaygi u 560hyo:4hyo wada mbiyax balay muda pnrngawan kari, balay bay malah pnwaya bukung, phiyu Nepak Ryeynpang Mincu Konghkwo. Kngkawas 2015 Nepal runu umniq idas 4 diyax 25 (Iyax sngayan tu6 diyax) 11 ji 56 pung cida ka ndan runu, kiya ka 81 kngkawas dhuq cida knbeyhing bay mqraqi runu, knkana smnalu ssapah cbiyaw mi nniqan hwangkong u wada pkngatun kana, hmrinas 6000 hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang, hbaraw bay qnlhangan icil ka miyah dmayaw uri. Kndadax kngkawas 2021 idas 5 prading, sotu Nepal Katmantu u pspuruq knbeyhing bay tbrinah knciyuk India mniq muhing dwiyaq Liburyeyk smalu elu na yosing knciyuk, hbaraw bay sediq ka musa msang kari India tasukwan. Kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 12, mniq nniqan qnlhangan ayus mqlahang keysacu u wada phuqil taxa sediq India mnniq alang mkbrnux Sitamarsi, kiya mi wada pqluqah 2 hiyi sediq India uri, wada msang balay ka quri India. Kiya mi mniq idas 6 diyax 13 cida wada muda snburah smalu keyngpo ka Nepal Gikay, wada dha ngalan tndxral Nepal kana ka tnayus Cyokoku mi India na muhing dwiyaq Liburyeyk mi nniqan pnprngawan Nepal mi India, kiya mi mniq India-tnayus Nepal na 15 keynsateyng u smkaul ucwang keysacu butayi ka qmlahang hiya. Kana ndan niyi u dmudul knsangan niya ka India, kiya u ndanan Nepal quri mniq muhing dwiyaq Liburyeyk niyi u mtura bay mndungus qnbliqan Cyokoku mniq msdalih nniqan hiya, so niyi ka ndanan Nepal pa qnita India u alaw wada dndulan Cyokoku ka kiya. Binaw dhuq kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 17, Nepal mi India u ini uda pspuruq mtdiyal mi mccbu nina. Sngcng cyuyu Spuda kngkawas 2015 idas 9 diyax 20 muda keyngpo, psnakan 7 sng ka Nepal, trahuc sng u 77 keyng; ida balay niqa 5 ka nniqan pkranan mi 14 cwancyu u wada plixan kana da, ida balay 75 ka keyng u kcka 2 ka wada psnakan. M7 sng niyi ka psnakan truma niyi: • Tu1 sng • Tu2 sng • Pakmati sng • Kantaki sng • Panpini sng • Kernari sng • Weynsi sng Lnlingay nniqan Hniwan lnlingay qnlhangan Nepal u so mbbaraw, snpeyyah tuiwildaya mquri tunarac hunac, knrbangan tunarac dhuq tuiwil ka 850 km, knrbangan tuhunac dhuq tudaya ka 200 km. Knrbangan tndxral u niqan 147,181 pinhwang km. Haypa u snpeyyah tudaya tnayus Cyokoku na tubaraw tudu dwiyaq (Hmrinas haypa 4000 m ) smquri tuhunac u kndudul mlih,tukcka (Haypa 1000 m dhuq 4000 m) ka dxral lmiqu, tuhunac pa msdalih nniqan India u mllbu haypa (Ini khrinas 1000 m) , kiya mi to bay so dxral tqapur qqhuni. Tudu dwiyaq Simaraya u wada mnida nkiya mtnayus Nepal mi Cyokoku, kiya ka knkana dudux dwiwaq Sngmu (Mniq Nepal u splawa dha dudux dwiyaq Sakamata) ka kcka uri, qnlangan mk10 knbaraw bay dudux dwiyaq pa wa mniq kcka dxral Nepal ka mk8. Knkana qnlhangan u spuda haypa psnakan 5 nniqan knkkarac cyu: • Mtilux tay mi Mtilux hari dxral nniqan u wa mniq truma ini dhuq haypa 1200 m. • Nniqan mkmuxul qqhuni cyu u wa mniq haypa 1200-2400 m; • Nniqan Knskuy cyu u wa mniq haypa 2400-3600 m; • Cucitay u wa mniq haypa 3600-4800 m; • Knkkarac Citay u mnhaypa hmrinas 4800 m na tubaraw dwiyaq. Tnkawas Nepal pa malu psnakan: Srwasaw ci, rbawan ci, sbhuran ci, krpuhan ci mi Misan ci. Kcka niya sbhuran ci u pusu balay ka spuda dndulan India riqi Mongcyara nyupan Sbhuran knkkarac, sbhuran knkkarac malan knbeyhing quyux u slxan bay skdudul thural ka dxral dwiyaq. Tudu dwiyaq Simaraya u malu snbang sbhuran knkkarac mquri tudaya ka kingal niya, Dungan u malu snbang snpeyyah hniwan lnlingay Asia Siporiya na misan knkkarac pnspuwan knskuy uri. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi snhlayan Dhuq kngkawas 2010, knhbrawan hiyi sediq knkana qnlhangan u 2,900 knbkiyan hiyi. Niqan 2 kluwanan ka minjoku Nepal, 1 kluwan ka sinjya India kyo (Sediq Kasu), 1 kluwan ka uxay sinjya India kyo joku (Matawari, mimah sinaw knhuran balay). Kngkawas 2001 ka knhbrawan hiyi sediq sinjya India kyo u 80.6%, sinjya Bu kyo ka 10.7% (Knhbaraw bay ka skari Cang Syeyn joku), knhbrawan hiyi sediq Muslim ka 4.4%, snluhay snhiyan ida ncbiyaw ka 3.6%, hbaraw bay sediq ka snluhay Idia kyo mi Bu kyo ddha snlhayan (Alaw dhiya u msdalih balay quri dndulan pnwaya kluwanan hangan India kyo, kcka na hbaraw sediq hiti daw wada mangal pnwaya kluwanan hangan India kyo, ddha kyo u wada dha pspuwan balay smluhay da). Niqan 1 kari uri u 3 kluwanan ka Nepal minjoku: India kyo pnwaya kluwan hangan syakay, Tndxral Cang Myeyn Sediq Tnpusu, Tudaya Cang joku. Keyjay Knkana sediq qnlhangan u msdalih 80% knhbrawan hiyi ka qmpah phuma pnwalang. Tuhunac Nepal u dxral brnux, mndungus balay ka smnalu elu beyhing ppanan rulu, ppwaluk balay quri keyjay India. Mniq nniqan lmiqu pa, nngalan quri sdhmaun rmiwaw u kiya ka stmanun balay. Bungka Kngkawas 2006 brah cida han, Nepal ka murux bay knkan qnlangan qnlhangan India kyo, quri so bungka dha u mndungus bay bungka India kyo uri. Ini ekan hiyi dapa ka sediq Nepal, alaw ngalan dha snbeyhing qmita ka dapa tanah; ini dha uqi ka babuy, alaw ngalan dha scuqi mrutiq. Mnrdang ka sediq Nepal daw, spuda Poromn ka dmudul ddaun psdhu, dmuwi bhuway waliq lmabu qbubur mnrdang sediq, kiya mi ini khrnasi 24 jikang daw sanan sndhu puniq, shhur qsiya yayung ka qbulic qbubur. Mwaya bay quri smdhu mrdang sediq mi mtbasi lhbun kndamac rdrudan, mrdang ka tama bubu daw kasi ka kwesun kana ka ubal hhiyi, dmuwi bhuway waliq lmabu hiyi, prading pnwaya caycyey, quri so pnwaya mtbasi lhbun kndamac rdrudan u muru waya niyi mkan cay mi ini msdalih tlung snaw mi qridin mk13 diyax, babaw niya 1 kngkawas u naqah tumal sqrasan, mimah sinaw mi mtmay byo, babaw 1 knghkawas daw kiya ka malu hrwahan ka lukus pnwaya rdrudan.

= Nepal = Gaga kska Yacow ka Nepal, 28 00 N, 84 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 147,181 sq km(hangan na o Tg94) (knlbanga dxgal o 143,351 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 3,830 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 29,033,914 hiyi. Gaga Kathmando ka poso alang paro, jiyax 28 idas 5 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Nepal ga wada sogan 28.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 25.40% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 45.80% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Bidhya Devi Bhandari, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 10 jiyax 29pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Nepal = Nepal = Nepal pa wa mniq dxral nniqan tohonac todo dwiyaq Himalaya na 1 qnlhangan kcka dxral, todaya o mslotoc Cyokoko, to3 dqras dxral daw msdalih India, tohoy qnlhangan Bengal wana mkiyax bay 27 km ksanan elo. Knlbangan dxral Nepal o 14.7181 knbkiyan km, to93 bnkowan knkana qnlangan, 2972 knhbrawan hiyi sediq o to48 bnkowan knkana qnlangan kiya. Alaw wa mniq dxral tobaraw ka nniqan dha, knbaraw bay kcka mk10 dwiyaq qnlangan o wa mniq kcka dxral mi mtayos Nepal ka 8 knbaraw dwiyaq, kiya ka knbaraw balay Dodox Dwiyaq Sngmo, so kiya o yahan balay sdhmawan rmiwaw sediq smkoxol mkala ddwiyaq ori. Niqan knrodah bay hniti jaysang bongka qnlangan ka Nepal, poso pnyahan snhiyan Bo kyo ka Boda Sakamoni o kiya ka mntoting Nepal. Poso balay snlhayan snhiyan qnlhangan ka India kyo, doma ini khbaraw ka smlohay Cangcwan Bo kyo mi Islam kyo. Nepal pa niqan bay hnhangan qnlangan qori knrmnan bay mi mbiyax bay mtdiyal ka sediq Korok. 18 th kcka cida wada phiyo Nepal Wangkwo, kiya o mnknrmox Sicang ori, bokoy daw wada moCingcaw qnlhangan Hwanso. Mniq 19 th pnrdingan cida Ingkoko mi Nepal ka mccbo daw, Nepal o wada moway dxral mnIngkoko India kiya mi mnsopo ppwalok dhiya. Nepal o ida balay India kyo Pnwaya Bokong qnlhangan. Kngkawas 2006 cida, kwohoy o wada hmtor biyax bokong qnlhangan Cyanantra, kngkawas 2008 idas 5 diyax 28, Nepal pnwaya keyngpo kaygi cida o wada mndongos bay moda snborah smmalo keyngpo ang, plixan ka pnwaya bokong mi knpriyox hangan qnlhangan Nepal Ryeynpang Minco Konghkwo. Ri-s Brah 7 th han. Nepal o knrodah bay qnlhangan Asia ori. Cbiyaw balay han pa kcka dxral Nepal o oo bay ini pntna qnlhangan han, mniq brah 6 th han, mniq brah 6 th han, sediq Nepal o tna mniq qori msdalih yayong Katmanto tnposo mniq. 12 th brah han o, India mnswayi Kanak bokong qnlhangan Kosyadwaci miyah Kepal mi wada phyowan bokong Nepal, bokoy daw pnhiyo Kpar, Asir, Kirati, Ricawi…wangcaw. Ya bay mniq brah kongweyn kngkawas 563, Sakamoni o mntoting kcka dxral Nepal saya na qnlhangan Ranpini knrodah Kapirowi, tmnsa qori snlhayan Sakamoni o kiya ka Bo kyo. Skari Cang Myeyn joko sediq Niwar ka wada dha ngalan Katmanto dxral ayo na Sediq Tnposo, binaw dhiya o oxay to sediq klowan tonarac, niqan knoo ka sediq Yarian. 17 th ka 'King Jidayi' sediq Niwar, qnlhangan Mala wangcaw ka Nepal o kiya ka Sicang mi todaya India dxral mbrnox iyax dha poso bay mawyi sonyo. Cida, Katmanto, Patan mi Paktapor o txtaxa nanaq moda ddaon dha ini psopo, toro alang mkbrnox o msnhor balay. Korok wangkwo 17 th kcka cida mtotoy ka sediq Korok, mniq toiwil yayong Kandaki mkngaho phiyo 1 tiping wangkwo ( brah hniwan Saa wangcaw), kngkawas 1768, Poritwi Narayang Saa ka wada pskingal nniqan dxral Nepal, mnhdo Katmanto dxral ayo to3 alang mkbrnox mpsanak mqriqo ddaon. Kari Niwar- sediq mcayis klowan ka sediq Niwar o skari kari Cang Myeyn, kndadax 12 th prading daw kiya ka ddiyon kari seyho mi kari qori ptpatas wenswey, dhoq saya wada spririh kari Nepal-Toiwil nniqan sediq India ccida sediq Kas na kari In O yosi ka rmirih da. Mbiyax bay qnlhangan na Korok o mniq kngkawas 1788 mi kngkawas 1791 mn2 kmrmox Sicang, hiti balay daw wada htran Cingcaw, rikisi o splawa 'Mccbo Korok'. Babaw mnhdo mccbo Korok daw mtohoy Cingting mddahor, wada mnqnlhangan Cingcaw, mqori hongti Cingcaw cngcn cinkong. Kiya mi mnIngkoko Tonarac India Kojyo mniq qmlahang India daw, kndodol mqori todaya knrmoxm kntto knrmox Cemongsyong mi Bhotan dtiping qnlhangan. So kiya, Korok mi Cingcaw pa ida pwalok knmalo conghwan pnloban dha, kiya ka shtor knrmxan Ingkoko. Kndadax Cingcaw kcka daw mowic ka qnlhangan, mrrodo ka kcka qnlhangan mi niqan ka miyah knrmox ngangoc Cingcaw, oka biyax dha qndahang payis ngangoc. Snpeyyah babaw pnhyowan ka Cyoka minkoko daw, Weynsokay o mniyox lmawa Nepal (Kiya ka Korok) tomal pnspowan 5 joko msopo, binaw cida daw wada qlhangan Ingkoko ka Nepal da. Wada krtan moway Ingkoko ka dxral tohonac Nepal mi Rana cngpyeyn . Kngkawas 1791, Ingkoko mi Nepal o psdho pbatas kingal qori omlik ka 'Patas Pnsdhowan Mpbbari '. Kngkawas 1814, Kepal mi mnIngkoko India ka mccbo, ini baka ka Nepal. Kawas 1 daw wada pkixan Ingkoko psdho matas 'Patas Pnsdhowan Saykri', wada kyapan sobway mnIngkoko Tonarac India Kojyo ka knbeyhing bay dxral tohonac Nepal, qori so neycng mi waymaw o sqlahang Ingkoko kana. Kngkawas 1846, mndalih Ingkoko ka heytay Korok Cyangko Pahator Rana ka dmodol cngpyeyn, wada mangal qpahon qori qmlahang heytay Nepal. Snpeyyah hiya daw, wada oka mndongos bay biyax niya ka bokong qnlhangan da, tnslotoc Rana ka lmotoc qpahon sosyang. 20 th kcka bokoy cida mi mccbo ka kcka qnlhangan dha nanaq. Babaw mnhdo Tomn2 mccbo knbeyhing qnlangan daw, Ingkoko mniq Nepal o pskoraw mangal tokobeyco biyax pa, alaw ini palix knciyok ka Nepal kiya ka wada mphing ori ka tokobeyco biyax sediq Ingkoko. Kngkawas 1951, Nepal Tahoy Tang mnsopo biyax bokong qnlhangan, pkiyax sosyang Rana malix biyax niya, mnhdo tnslotoc Rana 105 kngkawas qmnlhangan kajoko dha. Nepal bokong qnlhangan Tiribohan pkla rinji keyngpo, moda dmowi pnwaya bokong risyeynco. Kngkawas 1960 idas 12 Mahengtra bokong qnlhangan ka dmowi biyax, kngkawas 1961 idas 1 pkla kari hmtor knkana ddaon cngtang. Kngkawas 1962 idas 4 moda pnwaya ka keyngpo o Nepal ka India kyo bokong qnlhangan. Kngkawas 1989 dhoq kngkawas 1990, psporoq knbeyhing bay 'Jnmin Undo' ka Nepal, ngalan bokong qnlhangan ka Pilantra o pkixan mniq kngkawas 1990 idas 11 diyax 9 pkla borah keyngpo, mnhdo kngkawas 1961 beytaq cida ka oka tangpay pingyihoy tico, mniq lxayan ptmayan oo tang gikayco. Kngkawas 1994 idas 11 diyax 15, Nepal Kyosanto (Ryeynhe Maryey) mniq seyngkyo cida o wada mbiyax, binaw mangal biyax qmpah 1 kngkawas daw wada pkixan malax da. Kngkawas 1996 idas 2 diyax 13, Nepal kyosanto (Maw Coyi) pkla dmodol 'Jnmin Mccbo'. Kngkawas 2001 idas 6 diyax 1 kman cida, Katmanto Narayangsiti wangkong wada sntorong sntali bay poniq jikeyng, wangco Tipantra alaw qori omao qridin niya mi wada phoqil bokong qnlhangan Pilantra mi qridin bokong Ayswariya mi laqi tiping bokong Nirayang, kongco Serodi…….10 sngari tnsapah bokong. Tipantra hiya nanaq o wada jisaco mi mangal beyhing bay loqah, bokoy daw wada ini kmalo mi mhoqil ori da. Swayi bokong qnlhangan Pilantra ka Cyanantra o idas 4 cida mniq Hanomantoka kong (Smodal wangkong) psdho phyowan bokong qnlhangan, lmotoc mbokong. Binaw, hbaraw bay sediq snhiyi niyi o nkeykako Cyanantra mi smriqan niya moway tnsapah bokong ka qnnaqah noda niyi, so kiya qnlhangan Cyanantra ka dxral Nepal pa, hnhnang tnslotoc bokong o ini pntna so Pilantra jidayi cida da. Kndadax hiya cida, Nepal Kyosanto (Maw Coyi) na biyax ocwang o kndodol dkohon doma sediq. Dhoq kngkawas 2006, Nepal pa wana soto Katmanto nanaq, knoo bay dxral nniqan pawada qlhangan Nepal Kyosanto kana da; kngkawas 2004 potting hiti, Nepal Kyosanto prading moda qnborang soto. Kngkawas 2005 idas 2 diyax 1, bokong qnlhangan Cyanantra ptalax kana seyho, pkla kari hiti 3 kngkawas daw hiya nanaq ka moda dmodol borah bocyo yingkay. Kngkawas 2006 idas 1 diyax 14, ocwang hoco ka moda mcbo Katmanto nniqan dweriq 2 keyngsateyng keysaco, phoqil 10 sngari keysaco. So koson, Nepal neycngbo pkla kongkaw, mniq Katmanto moda pnwaya qmlahang kman,mniq idas1 diyax 19 cida o dmodol kwoing tyeynsyon kojyo pstoq Katmanto mqori ngangoc ryeynrako, kiya ka hmtor idas 1 diyax 20 moda knbeyhing bay yosing mo knciyok. Idas 4 diyax 21, spoda 7 tang ryeynmong dmodol knciyok bikong qnlhangan mi hmtor qmpah 2 iyax diyax sngayan daw, spoda tnpkixan Amirika mi India, qnlhangan Cyanatra o wada smrowa malix biyax, smrowa sobway niya sediq qnlhangan ka biyax qmlahang. Spoda treybi moda rmngaw kari ka hiya, pkla kari ptalix kana neyke, sobway niya sediq qnlhangan ka biyax singcng, kiya o mpseyngkyo ori, dmodo kari hantaypay o smkaol mpsosyang niya. Idas 4 diyax 30, Koyirala mosa wangkong, smrowa spoda kokong qnlhangan Cyanantra psdhowan sosyang Nepal. Mnhdo ka mccbo kcka qnlhangan dha nanaq mi plixan ka pnwaya Bokong. Kngkawas 2006 idas 5 diyax 18, Kepal gikay o kasi mntxan moda, palax bokong qnlhangan Cyanatra knkana biyax na dmowi heytay ori, kiya daw ini ddoli tnslotoc bokong ka Nepal hiti da. Nasi pnklanan iyax cida niqan mano ka srngaw ppdongos, bokong Nepal o mosa so pkla ririh weynso nanaq da. Idas 6 diyax 11, Nepal gikay o wada moda palax bokong qnlhangan 'Pqori gikay wada moda ka giang' na biyax ini srowa, kiya ka gikay giying mniq pbatas hwaang mkhorico brah cida, kasi ka spoda snrwanan bokong qnlhangan han. Seyho mi Mawpay prading pprngaw kiya ka mpskingal kari ddaon qnlhangan hiti. Idas 11 diyax 7, Kyosanto Nepal mi seyho o wada psdho kari, malax ocwang mtdiyal, tomal seyho. Kngkawas 2007 idas 9 diyax 18, Kyosanto Nepal pkla kari mlatac rinji seyho. Idas 12 diyax 23, dmodol kari pwaya cyonco risyeyn oo tang mi dmodol kari balay bay malax pwaya cyonco, moda pwaya kongh na Kyosanto Nepal wada psdho kari, malax pwaya cyonco, brinah gikay Dongan ka Kyosanto Nepal . Kngkawas 2008 idas 4 diyax 10 moda knbeyhing seyngkyo, wada mbiyax mangal hmrinas 30% hyo ka Kyosanto Nepal , wada mto1 knbeyhing tang mniq Nepal phiyo keyngpo kaygi. Kngkawas 2008 idas 5 diyax 28, phiyo keyngpo Nepal kaygi o 560hyo:4hyo wada mbiyax balay moda pnrngawan kari, balay bay malah pnwaya bokong, phiyo Nepak Ryeynpang Minco Konghkwo. Kngkawas 2015 Nepal rono omniq idas 4 diyax 25 (Iyax sngayan to6 diyax) 11 ji 56 pong cida ka ndan rono, kiya ka 81 kngkawas dhoq cida knbeyhing bay mqraqi rono, knkana smnalo ssapah cbiyaw mi nniqan hwangkong o wada pkngaton kana, hmrinas 6000 hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang, hbaraw bay qnlhangan icil ka miyah dmayaw ori. Kndadax kngkawas 2021 idas 5 prading, soto Nepal Katmanto o psporoq knbeyhing bay tbrinah knciyok India mniq mohing dwiyaq Liboryeyk smalo elo na yosing knciyok, hbaraw bay sediq ka mosa msang kari India tasokwan. Kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 12, mniq nniqan qnlhangan ayos mqlahang keysaco o wada phoqil taxa sediq India mnniq alang mkbrnox Sitamarsi, kiya mi wada pqloqah 2 hiyi sediq India ori, wada msang balay ka qori India. Kiya mi mniq idas 6 diyax 13 cida wada moda snborah smalo keyngpo ka Nepal Gikay, wada dha ngalan tndxral Nepal kana ka tnayos Cyokoko mi India na mohing dwiyaq Liboryeyk mi nniqan pnprngawan Nepal mi India, kiya mi mniq India-tnayos Nepal na 15 keynsateyng o smkaol ocwang keysaco botayi ka qmlahang hiya. Kana ndan niyi o dmodol knsangan niya ka India, kiya o ndanan Nepal qori mniq mohing dwiyaq Liboryeyk niyi o mtora bay mndongos qnbliqan Cyokoko mniq msdalih nniqan hiya, so niyi ka ndanan Nepal pa qnita India o alaw wada dndolan Cyokoko ka kiya. Binaw dhoq kngkawas 2020 idas 6 diyax 17, Nepal mi India o ini oda psporoq mtdiyal mi mccbo nina. Sngcng cyoyo Spoda kngkawas 2015 idas 9 diyax 20 moda keyngpo, psnakan 7 sng ka Nepal, trahoc sng o 77 keyng; ida balay niqa 5 ka nniqan pkranan mi 14 cwancyo o wada plixan kana da, ida balay 75 ka keyng o kcka 2 ka wada psnakan. M7 sng niyi ka psnakan troma niyi: • To1 sng • To2 sng • Pakmati sng • Kantaki sng • Panpini sng • Kernari sng • Weynsi sng Lnlingay nniqan Hniwan lnlingay qnlhangan Nepal o so mbbaraw, snpeyyah toiwildaya mqori tonarac honac, knrbangan tonarac dhoq toiwil ka 850 km, knrbangan tohonac dhoq todaya ka 200 km. Knrbangan tndxral o niqan 147,181 pinhwang km. Haypa o snpeyyah todaya tnayos Cyokoko na tobaraw todo dwiyaq (Hmrinas haypa 4000 m ) smqori tohonac o kndodol mlih,tokcka (Haypa 1000 m dhoq 4000 m) ka dxral lmiqo, tohonac pa msdalih nniqan India o mllbo haypa (Ini khrinas 1000 m) , kiya mi to bay so dxral tqapor qqhoni. Todo dwiyaq Simaraya o wada mnida nkiya mtnayos Nepal mi Cyokoko, kiya ka knkana dodox dwiwaq Sngmo (Mniq Nepal o splawa dha dodox dwiyaq Sakamata) ka kcka ori, qnlangan mk10 knbaraw bay dodox dwiyaq pa wa mniq kcka dxral Nepal ka mk8. Knkana qnlhangan o spoda haypa psnakan 5 nniqan knkkarac cyo: • Mtilox tay mi Mtilox hari dxral nniqan o wa mniq troma ini dhoq haypa 1200 m. • Nniqan mkmoxol qqhoni cyo o wa mniq haypa 1200-2400 m; • Nniqan Knskoy cyo o wa mniq haypa 2400-3600 m; • Cocitay o wa mniq haypa 3600-4800 m; • Knkkarac Citay o mnhaypa hmrinas 4800 m na tobaraw dwiyaq. Tnkawas Nepal pa malo psnakan: Srwasaw ci, rbawan ci, sbhoran ci, krpohan ci mi Misan ci. Kcka niya sbhoran ci o poso balay ka spoda dndolan India riqi Mongcyara nyopan Sbhoran knkkarac, sbhoran knkkarac malan knbeyhing qoyox o slxan bay skdodol thoral ka dxral dwiyaq. Todo dwiyaq Simaraya o malo snbang sbhoran knkkarac mqori todaya ka kingal niya, Dongan o malo snbang snpeyyah hniwan lnlingay Asia Siporiya na misan knkkarac pnspowan knskoy ori. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq mi snhlayan Dhoq kngkawas 2010, knhbrawan hiyi sediq knkana qnlhangan o 2,900 knbkiyan hiyi. Niqan 2 klowanan ka minjoko Nepal, 1 klowan ka sinjya India kyo (Sediq Kaso), 1 klowan ka oxay sinjya India kyo joko (Matawari, mimah sinaw knhoran balay). Kngkawas 2001 ka knhbrawan hiyi sediq sinjya India kyo o 80.6%, sinjya Bo kyo ka 10.7% (Knhbaraw bay ka skari Cang Syeyn joko), knhbrawan hiyi sediq Moslim ka 4.4%, snlohay snhiyan ida ncbiyaw ka 3.6%, hbaraw bay sediq ka snlohay Idia kyo mi Bo kyo ddha snlhayan (Alaw dhiya o msdalih balay qori dndolan pnwaya klowanan hangan India kyo, kcka na hbaraw sediq hiti daw wada mangal pnwaya klowanan hangan India kyo, ddha kyo o wada dha pspowan balay smlohay da). Niqan 1 kari ori o 3 klowanan ka Nepal minjoko: India kyo pnwaya klowan hangan syakay, Tndxral Cang Myeyn Sediq Tnposo, Todaya Cang joko. Keyjay Knkana sediq qnlhangan o msdalih 80% knhbrawan hiyi ka qmpah phoma pnwalang. Tohonac Nepal o dxral brnox, mndongos balay ka smnalo elo beyhing ppanan rolo, ppwalok balay qori keyjay India. Mniq nniqan lmiqo pa, nngalan qori sdhmaon rmiwaw o kiya ka stmanon balay. Bongka Kngkawas 2006 brah cida han, Nepal ka morox bay knkan qnlangan qnlhangan India kyo, qori so bongka dha o mndongos bay bongka India kyo ori. Ini ekan hiyi dapa ka sediq Nepal, alaw ngalan dha snbeyhing qmita ka dapa tanah; ini dha oqi ka baboy, alaw ngalan dha scoqi mrotiq. Mnrdang ka sediq Nepal daw, spoda Poromn ka dmodol ddaon psdho, dmowi bhoway waliq lmabo qbobor mnrdang sediq, kiya mi ini khrnasi 24 jikang daw sanan sndho poniq, shhor qsiya yayong ka qbolic qbobor. Mwaya bay qori smdho mrdang sediq mi mtbasi lhbon kndamac rdrodan, mrdang ka tama bobo daw kasi ka kweson kana ka obal hhiyi, dmowi bhoway waliq lmabo hiyi, prading pnwaya caycyey, qori so pnwaya mtbasi lhbon kndamac rdrodan o moro waya niyi mkan cay mi ini msdalih tlong snaw mi qridin mk13 diyax, babaw niya 1 kngkawas o naqah tomal sqrasan, mimah sinaw mi mtmay byo, babaw 1 knghkawas daw kiya ka malo hrwahan ka lokos pnwaya rdrodan.
